text: The Airship, or 100 Years Hence is a 1908 American silent comedy-drama movie directed by J. Stuart BlacktonTHE AIRSHIP; OR, 100 YEARS HENCE and stars Florence Lawrence and J. Stuart Blackton. ==Actors== * Florence Lawrence as Airship passenger * J. Stuart Blackton ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:1908 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy-drama movies
title: The Airship, or 100 Years Hence
